root.name: District 187: Sin Streets
root.description: OverviewDistrict 187 is a free-to-play, multiplayer-only first person shooter, in which teams of players battle each other as SWAT agents or "gangsters." The game features a number of game modes including Bank Heist and Street Fight, a player clan warfare system.SettingIn the late 21st century, a global economic collapse leads to a society where criminals battle in the streets against what is left of the government.
